availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram G. Crutcher (Franklin County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Son of John Crutcher and Martha Crutcher. Married to Esey Crutcher. Father of Mary F Crutcher, Susan Crutcher, John M Crutcher, Benjamin L Crutcher, Martha Ann Crutcher, William G Crutcher, and Sena Crutcher. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 75A
